price: 他为你们以大地为摇篮，他为你们在大地上开辟许多道路，他从天上降下雨水，而借雨水生产各种植物。
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّن نَّبَاتٖ شَتَّىٰ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wasalaka lakum fīhā subulan wa-anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-akhrajnā bihi azwājan min nabātin shattā
